snippet: At least 20 people were killed and 60 were wounded in the attack on the base in Bor in Jonglei State, a United Nations official said.
abstract: Group of people dressed in civilian clothes pretending to be peaceful protesters force their way into a United Nations base in South Sudan sheltering 5,000 civilians and open fire; at least 20 people are killed and 60 wounded.
lead_paragraph: At least 20 people were killed and 60 were wounded in the attack on the base in Bor in Jonglei State, a United Nations official said.
